textos_fuente.text: GenX Tavern - About Skip to Main Content (813)-694-7001 contactus@genxtavern.com 103 East Jackson Street                                                          , Tampa Menu Order Online Parties Events Catering Jobs About Gallery Twitter page Facebook page Instagram page Google page Toggle navigation Twitter page Facebook page Instagram page Google page Menu Order Online Parties Events Catering Jobs About Gallery Gen X Tavern Dot slide navigation number 1 Dot slide navigation number 2 Dot slide navigation number 3 slideshow start stop playing Gen X Tavern About us Located in Downtown Tampa, Gen X Tavern was created for people who take their food and drink seriously, but not themselves. Our restaurant bar is full of nostalgia that will remind you of some of the best times of your life, all while you enjoy some classic treats with a current influence. We have that Modern Fare with Retro Flair! Decked out in the fads of yesteryear with a contemporary twist, we pay homage to a period of time - that if you were there - was both awesome and a beautiful disaster. Hello, 80's and 90's. Our jeans may be a little tighter and dance moves funkier, but at the end of the day we've all got something in common. Let the good times roll. Gen X Tavern honors 80's and 90's style, swagger, and unflinching character. It almost feels like you've been here before, because you have... if not literally, certainly figuratively. Welcome to your new favorite restaurant and neighborhood bar! Located in Downtown Tampa, Florida, blocks from Curtis Hixon Park, Amalie Arena and The Tampa Riverwalk, our dining area is decked out with nostalgic decor while our food and drink menu is inspired by currently popular and timeless dishes. We have the Modern Fare with Retro Flair! Contact us: by phone (813)-694-7001, by email contactus@genxtavern.com Order Parties Catering Jobs

White Chateau Ste . Michelle Riesling $8.00/glass Blended riesling gropes from vineyards throughout Washington's Columbia Valley make this a refreshing white wine with a crisp and fruity taste. Bright flavors of white peach, green apple. mango, and lemon-lime Jermann Pinot Grigio $9.00/glass Italian nd straw-yellow in colour, aroma is intense, full and fruity, with excellent persistence. taste is dry, velvety, fragrant and persistent Oyster Bay Sauvignon Blanc $9.50/glass Aromas of sliced lime, guava, star fruit, savory herbs and flowers. medium-bodied, fresh and crisp with a juicy, mouthwatering nature. flavorful and bright Rabble Rose $9.00/glass Bright aromas of strawberry, grapefruit and watermelon rind. punchy and crisp on the palate. refreshingly dry with mouthwatering acidity Simi Chardonnay $9.50/glass Russian River Valley wine with flavors of citrus, green apple and nectarine, followed by toasty oak and a fine minerality. clean delicate fruit balanced with acidity builds to a long, lingering finish Kiss Army Eva White $45.00/bottle You wanted the best, you got the best! Rock and roll all night with this 2017 Spanish wine. Proof Awards Double Gold & 99 Rated. take home the souvenir bottle! Red J Vineyards Pinot Noir $9.00/glass Smooth, balanced and approachable, J Multi-Appellation Pinot Noir offers polished, fruit-driven flavorful notes of dark plum, black cherry, boysenberry and baked strawberry are nicely layered on the plush palate with hints of cocoa dust, clove and toasted almond. Soft and approachable with generous fruit characteristics Hahn Founders Pinot Noir $9.00/glass Aromas of red and dark cherry, raspberry and strawberry joined by subtle touches ofvanilla and toasty oak. Palate ismedium-bodied with silky tannins, a softround mouthfeel Hahn Founders Cabernet Sauvignon $9.00/glass vibrant aromas of red and dark cherry, raspberry and plum, subtle touches of vanilla and toasted oak. silky tannins and excellent acid balance are joined by delicate flavors of red cherry and raspberry Cocktails I Smell Sex and Candy $12.00 Misguided spirits howe & hummels crooked vodka, St. Germaine elderflower liquor, lime juice, lemonade, sparkling rose, rock candy Give Me Those Pop Rockin' Beats $12.00 Ketel one vodka, midori melon liqueur, chambord raspberry liqueur, pineapple, watermelon pop rocks Princess Peach $12.00 Don julio blanco, peach schnapps, lime, dash grenadine Espresso Yourself Martini $12.00 House brewed nitrogen infused ketel one espresso, kahlua coffee liqueur, simple Strawberry Starburst $11.00 Smirnoff vanilla vodka, watermelon pucker, Hawaiian punch, half & half, sprite Cheech & Chong-A-'rita $13.00 Misguided spirits black dove’s sacred blanco heart tequila, KORE cbd oil, agave, lime, watermelon pucker, KORE cbd gummy garnish Purple Rain $12.00 Astral reposado tequila, cointreau orange liqueur, agave nectar, blueberry syrup, hibiscus Pretty in Pink $11.00 Smirnoff blueberry vodka, Gambino brut, lemon, simple syrup, cranberry Ye Olde Fashioned $13.00 New riff Kentucky straight bourbon whiskey (bottled in bond), angostura bitters, simple syrup, orange rind, cherry From Dusk 'Til Dawn $11.00 Misguided spirits black dove’s sacred heart reposado tequila, cointreau orange liqueur, fresh lime juice, agave nectar, spicy mango, fresh jalapeno Pump up The Jam $12.00 Bacardi rum, lemon, raspberry jam, raspberries, blueberries, topped with sprite Bangin' Tang-A-'Rita $11.00 Misguided spirits black dove’s sacred heart blanco tequila , agave, lime, tang, with a tang rim Loaded Sunny D $9.00 Margaritaville tequila, grenadine, sunny d. served in a classic sunny d bottle! GenX Tavern - Downtown, Tampa, FL × Did you know we do catering? Whatever your occasion, however big or small, we have the perfect options to choose from. Cater your birthday party, holiday party, corporate events, wedding festivities and more! Catering Packages × We're hiring! Call, email or submit an inquiry today to learn more! Job Listings × Let us host your special event! Whether a birthday party, office function or any other special occasion - we take care of all the fine details, bringing your event to life, just as you imagined. Host your next party or get together Book your party × Order your favorite dishes in seconds! Order Online × We are taking online reservations! Let’s ensure you get a great table: Book today! We recommend making a reservation ahead of time. Book your table today! GenX Tavern would be honored to provide our services for your next event.  Each event is bespoke to your tastes and needs, to provide the best experience possible for you and your guests. Book a party Catering Let Us Cater Your Special Occasion! Good food is an essential part of any event - let us do the catering and make it one to remember. Inquire catering Order online Pick Up Your Favorite Food Don't feel like cooking today? We got you covered - order now! Order Proud To Be Authentic Our Menu We craft unique cocktails Drinks Your Private Party Spot Book a party Dot slide navigation number 1 Dot slide navigation number 2 Dot slide navigation number 3 slideshow start stop playing _ Modern Fare with Retro Flair Located in Downtown Tampa, Gen X Tavern was created for people who take their food and drink seriously, but not themselves. Read more about us Events Wednesday Night Karaoke! Wednesday September 10th Every Wednesday Get ready to sing your heart out at GenX Tavern’s Wednesday Night Karaoke with Events Done Right , kicking off tonight at 7:00 PM! Whether you’re a seasoned performer or just looking to have some fun, grab the mic and belt out your favorite hits—from 80s anthems and 90s throwbacks to today’s chart-toppers! All music genres welcome  Drink specials all night  Good vibes, great crowd, and non-stop entertainment GenX Tavern | 103 East Jackson Street, Downtown Tampa  No cover | All ages welcome GiRLs night OUT Thursday September 11th Every Thursday It’s GiRLs Night OUT at GenX Tavern! Grab your crew and head to Downtown Tampa every Thursday for the ultimate throwback party! We’re spinning the best pop hits from the 80s, 90s, 2000s, and today — everything from Britney to Beyoncé, Spice Girls to Sabrina.       *2-for-1 drinks for ladies from 8PM–10PM  *Pop anthems all night long     103 E Jackson St – right in the heart of downtown Let’s dance, sip, and sing like it’s girls night every night! Too Fresh Fridays Friday September 12th Every Friday Kick off the weekend with Too Fresh Fridays at GenX Tavern !   Join us in downtown Tampa for a night of old-school rap and classic party jamz, guaranteed to keep you moving from 8 PM to 1 AM.    Special guest DJs spin the hottest throwbacks and legendary beats that defined an era. Whether you’re vibing at the bar or hitting the dance floor, this is the spot to relive the days of the best of hip-hop and party anthems.    No cover – just good vibes, great drinks, and timeless music. Pull up, bring your crew, and get fresh! The Grind at GenX Tavern Saturday September 13th Every Saturday MTV's The Grind taught a generation how to dance and we're keeping your booty shaking and hands waving as we bring that energy to Downtown Tampa at GenX Tavern every Saturday Night! The Grind features some of Tampa's best DJ's like DJ Chris Craze, Matt The Bratt, DJ Matt Dodge and more spinning an uptempo party mix of classic 80s and 90s jams mashed up with some current pop hits. Monday Night Trivia Monday September 15th Every Monday Get your team together, head downtown and win some awesome prizes while enjoying great food and drinks every Monday for T rivia Night at GenX Tavern with Events Done Right ! Tampa's best Trivia Night kicks off at 7pm so bring your pop culture knowledge and compete for the trophy! Stop events carousel Play events carousel Reviews Review by - Google Ben B: Found another gem in Tampa! Decor is spot on. N64 with Mario Kart is always a plus. The manager turned the sound on to the NBA Finals for us. Fantastic experience. Review by - Google Kelly W: This was such a fun find! The atmosphere is top notch, loved looking at all of the awesome decor all over the bar. We had the Dunkaroos and it was a very large portion and a bit much. Review by - Google Antony F: Great themed pub. Food was good and the drinks where spectacular. If you're a Gen X'r you'll have great nostalgia, if not, you'll still like the food and drinks. Review by - Google Ryan B: Incredibly unique food and drink options combined with an amazing ambiance that's directly out of my days from middle school. It's incredibly nostalgic and I love it Review by - Google Gracie G: Went here for drinks with friends and the fried pickles were amazing! The DJ was playing great music and the atmosphere is fun and lively. The server was attentive and nice. GenX Tavern, a new Tampa eatery, will fill you with '80s and '90s nostalgia | FOX 13 Tampa Bay News Weather Sports Good Day We Live Here Contests More Watch Live Expand / Collapse search ☰ Search site News Top Stories Local Tampa Bay News Florida Tonight National FOX 13 Investigates Consumer Health Politics Seen on TV Daily Newsletter FOX News Sunday Rhythm Roots Weather SkyTower Radar Views Interactive Radar Live Webcams Marine Weather Weather Alerts Hurricane Safety Tracking the Tropics MyFoxHurricane FOX Weather Sports Buccaneers Rays Lightning No Off Days with Scott Smith Weekly Fishing Report High School Sports Good Day Traffic Charley's World Hometown Heroes Extraordinary Ordinaries Recipes First Birthdays We Live Here What's Right Dinner DeeAs One Tank Trips Theme Parks Made in Tampa Bay Recipes, Food & Drink Tampa Bay History Care Force Watch Live How To Stream Live FOX 13 Newscasts LiveNOW from FOX FOX Weather FOX Soul FOX Live Feed Central NASA TV Money Consumer Personal Finance The Economy Small Business Entertainment Headlines Trending Stories FOX Shows What's on FOX 13 Contests Tampa Bay Reads Regional News Orlando News - FOX 35 Orlando Gainesville News - FOX 51 Gainesville Atlanta News - FOX 5 Atlanta About Us Meet the FOX 13 team TV Listings Jobs & Internships WTVT History Closed Captioning FCC Public File FCC Applications Contact Us GenX Tavern, a new Tampa eatery, will fill you with '80s and '90s nostalgia By FOX 13 News staff Published May 11, 2019 4:45pm EDT We Live Here FOX 13 News Share Copy Link Email Facebook Twitter LinkedIn Reddit TAMPA, Fla. - There’s a new eatery in downtown Tampa that promises to take you back in time. It’s called GenX Tavern, and this place pays tribute to everything from the 80s and 90s, the era in which Generation X grew up. If you're in your 30s and 40s, your nostalgia level will hit the roof inside this restaurant. From décor to the menu, there are reminders of yesteryear everywhere. There are references around every corner, including a chandelier made out of floppy discs and a Ferris Bueller painting. The menu is also a nod to the decades. There are Dunkaroos, Spaghetti-Os and a cocktail inspired by the kids drink “Tang.” The owner said the restaurant since its opening, even the millennials are enjoying the atmosphere. “I think everybody – no matter their generation – looks up on those two decades really favorably,” explained Dave Burton, the owner. “So I thought, ‘How fun would it be to dedicate a concept entirely to those two decades?” Image 1 of 10 ▼ LINK: For more information, head over to the Genx Tavern website .
